00031    /*
00032    * Read interval and outputFileName. 
00033    */
00034    void WriteConfig::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00035    {

00037       readOutputFileName(in);
00038       isInitialized_ = true;
00039    }

00042    * Read interval and outputFileName. 
00043    */
00044    void WriteConfig::setup() 
00045    {  nSample_ = 0; }

00047    /*
00048    * Dump configuration to file
00049    */
00050    void WriteConfig::sample(long iStep) 
00051    {
00052       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00053 
00054          // Construct new fileName: outputFileName + toString(nSample)
00055          std::string filename;
00056          filename  = outputFileName();
00057          filename += toString(nSample_);
00058 
00059          // Open output file, write data, and close file
00060          //simulation().fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile_);
00061          simulation().writeConfig(filename);
00062          //outputFile_.close();
00063          ++nSample_;
00064 
00065       }
00066    }
00067 
00068 }
